element.label: Enabled
element.description: Is the Magium Active Directory integration enabled?

element.label: Client ID
element.description: You need to configure an application in Active Directory and enter its ID here

element.label: Client Secret
element.description: When you created an application in Active Directory you should have received a one-time use key. Enter that here.

element.label: Directory
element.description: Provide a directory ID if you are using your own Azure instance instead of Microsoft's global database. The directory ID is usually found under the directory properties.

element.label: Return URL
element.description: This is the URL you want Active Directory to redirect back to after authentication.

element.label: Remap HTTPS
element.description: Should the system remap HTTP-based URLs to HTTPS. Azure Active Directory generally will not redirect to a non-secure URL. Enabling this setting protects against that.
